Description: This feature covers the management of access cards including adding, searching, activating/deactivating, and deleting cards, as well as user card mapping functionalities.

Scenarios.Scenario: Manage Access Card: Verify paging functionality

Steps.Description: Login to MIS with Username Dummy.Dummy and password R2VtaW5pQDEyMw==
Click on Signin button
User should be navigated to MIS homepage
user navigates on "Access Card Management" and then "Manage Access Card"
Verify Entries changes to "25" number of entries
Verify Next Button works
Verify Previous Button works

Click on Signin button
User should be navigated to MIS homepage
user navigates on "Access Card Management" and then "Manage Access Card"
User adds new "915502354" Access card
Verify Card Added successfully
Login to MIS with Username Dummy.Dummy and password R2VtaW5pQDEyMw==
Click on Signin button

user navigates on "Access Card Management" and then "Manage Access Card"
searching a "125552356" card
Verify search function is "125552356" working in mac
